title: #80 - Hotline Edition: We’ve Been Dating for Two Months and He Wants to Move Across the Country With Me…
description:
It’s another edition of the Matchmaker Maria Hotline! If you want to ask Maria a question on an upcoming episode, make sure you’re following her on Instagram to know when the hotline will open up next… http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria

On this week’s episode… 

  • I’m 23 and having a hard time with online dating. What should I do?
  • I’ve been dating a guy for two months and wants to move across the country with me. What should I do?
  • How do I get over the self doubt that comes up when dating?
  • How do I know if I should go on another date with them?

Share your name and email and you will be notified first when details for the Agape Intensive Retreat - April 29- May 1, 2022 - are released! https://agapematch.wufoo.com/forms/z14chqhd03yfh04/

Follow Maria on Instagram to find out when the Matchmaker Hotline will be open to talk! http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria 

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
